mapper.sql: id, dept_id, name, type, legal_name, legal_id_card, linkman, linkman_phone, mode, bus_license_front_img, bus_license_back_img, transport_license_front_img, transport_license_back_img, bank_open_front_img, bank_open_back_img, admin_num, default_admin_id, driver_num, running_driver_num, settle_type, settle_period, settle_corporation, state, business_state, is_invoice, create_user_id, create_time, check_user_id, check_time
mapper.select: SELECT carr.id AS id, carr.state AS state, carr.NAME AS NAME, carr.linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone FROM d_carrier carr left JOIN d_carrier_driver_con con ON con.carrier_id = carr.id left JOIN d_driver dri ON dri.id = con.driver_id WHERE dri.id = #{driverId}

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dc.dept_id AS deptId, dc.NAME AS NAME, dc.linkman AS linkman, dc.linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone, dc.legal_name AS legalName, dc.legal_id_card AS legalIdCard, dc.settle_type AS settleType, dc.settle_period AS settlePeriod, dc.bus_license_front_img AS busLicenseFrontImg, dc.bus_license_back_img AS busLicenseBackImg, dc.transport_license_front_img AS transportLicenseFrontImg, dc.transport_license_Back_img AS transportLicenseBackImg, dc.bank_open_front_img AS bankOpenFrontImg, dc.bank_open_Back_img AS bankOpenBackImg, dc.MODE AS MODE, dc.is_invoice AS isInvoice, dc.state AS state, sbcb.card_type AS cardType, sbcb.card_name AS cardName, sbcb.bank_name AS bankName, sbcb.card_no AS cardNo, dc.check_time as operateTime, ba.NAME AS operateName FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON sbcb.user_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN b_admin ba ON ba.id = dc.check_user_id
dc.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and dc.linkman like CONCAT('%',#{linkman},'%')
and dc.linkman_phone like CONCAT('%',#{linkmanPhone},'%')
and sbcb.card_no like CONCAT('%',#{cardNo},'%')
and dc.legal_name like CONCAT('%',#{legalName},'%')
and dc.legal_id_card like CONCAT('%',#{legalIdCard},'%')
and dc.is_invoice = #{isInvoice}
and dc.settle_type = #{settleType}
and dc.state = #{state}
and ba.name like CONCAT('%',#{operateName},'%')
and dc.type = 2 and dcdc.role >= 2 group by dc.id order by dc.create_time desc,dc.check_time desc

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dc.NAME AS NAME, dc.linkman AS linkman, dc.linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone, dc.legal_name AS legalName, dc.legal_id_card AS legalIdCard, dc.bus_license_front_img AS busLicenseFrontImg, dc.bus_license_back_img AS busLicenseBackImg, dc.transport_license_front_img AS transportLicenseFrontImg, dc.transport_license_back_img AS transportLicenseBackImg, dc.bank_open_front_img AS bankOpenFrontImg, dc.bank_open_back_img AS bankOpenBackImg, dc.settle_period, dc.settle_type AS settleType, dc.MODE AS MODE, dc.is_invoice AS isInvoice, sbcb.card_type AS cardType, sbcb.province_name AS provinceName, sbcb.area_name AS areaName, sbcb.card_name AS cardName, sbcb.bank_name AS bankName, sbcb.pay_bank_no AS payBankNo, sbcb.card_no AS cardNo, sbcb.bank_code AS bankCode FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON sbcb.user_id = dc.id where dc.id = #{carrierId} group by dc.id

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dc.NAME AS NAME, dc.linkman AS linkman, dc.linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone, dc.legal_name AS legalName, dc.legal_id_card AS legalIdCard, dc.settle_type AS settleType, dc.settle_period AS settlePeriod, dc.MODE AS MODE, dc.is_invoice AS isInvoice FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON sbcb.user_id = dc.id
dc.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and dc.linkman like CONCAT('%',#{linkman},'%')
and dc.linkman_phone like CONCAT('%',#{linkmanPhone},'%')
and dc.settle_type = #{settleType}
and dc.type = 2 and dc.state = 2 and dc.business_state = 0 and dc.mode in (3,5,7,9) and sbcb.bank_name != '' and sbcb.state = 1 group by dc.id order by dc.create_time desc, dc.check_time desc

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dc.NAME AS NAME, dc.linkman AS linkman, dc.linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone, dc.legal_name AS legalName, dc.legal_id_card AS legalIdCard, dc.settle_type AS settleType, dc.settle_period AS settlePeriod, dc.MODE AS MODE, dc.is_invoice AS isInvoice FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON dc.id = sbcb.user_id
(dc.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or dc.linkman like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or dc.linkman_phone like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
and dc.settle_type = #{settleType}
and dc.type = 2 and dc.state = 2 and dc.business_state = 0 and dc.mode in (3,5,7,9) and sbcb.bank_name != '' and sbcb.state = 1 group by dc.id order by dc.create_time desc, dc.check_time desc

SELECT dc.type AS type, dc.NAME AS NAME, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id
(dd.phone = #{phone} or dd.id_card = #{idCard})
and dd.id <> #{driverId}
limit 1

SELECT count(dc.id) FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id
(dd.phone = #{phone} or dd.id_card = #{idCard})
and dc.type = 1

SELECT count( dc.id ) FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id where dc.id = #{carrierId} and dc.type = 2 and dd.phone = #{linkmanPhone} and dd.id_card = #{legalIdCard}
select cr.* from d_carrier cr join d_carrier_driver_con con on con.carrier_id = cr.id where con.driver_id = #{driverId}
select carrier_id from d_carrier_driver_con where driver_id = #{driverId}

SELECT dd.id AS id, dc.id as carrierId, dcdc.id as roleId, dd.user_id AS userId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card as idCard, dd.identity AS identity, dd.business_state AS businessState, dcdc.state AS state, dcdc.role as role, dc.type as type, dc.state as carrierState, dc.NAME AS companyName, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dd.photo_img AS photoImg FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id where dd.id = #{driverId} and dc.state < 4

SELECT dd.id AS id, dc.id AS carrierId, dcdc.id AS roleId, dd.user_id AS userId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard, dd.identity AS identity, dd.business_state AS businessState, dcdc.state AS state, dcdc.role AS role, dc.type AS type, dc.state AS carrierState, dc.NAME AS companyName, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dd.photo_img AS photoImg FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN d_carrier_driver_con dcdc ON dcdc.carrier_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = dcdc.driver_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id WHERE dcdc.id = #{roleId} and dcdc.driver_id = #{loginId} and dc.state < 4
select * from d_carrier where dept_id = #{deptId}

SELECT dc.id as id,dc.name as name FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2) urd ON urd.dept_id = dc.id WHERE urd.user_id = #{loginId} AND urd.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT COUNT(dd.id) FROM d_driver dd LEFT JOIN s_user_role_dept urd ON dd.id = urd.user_id LEFT JOIN d_carrier dc ON dc.id = urd.dept_id where urd.dept_type = 2 AND urd.user_type = 2 AND dc.id = #{carrierId} and dd.phone = #{linkmanPhone}

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dc.dept_id AS deptId, dc.NAME AS NAME, dc.linkman AS linkman, dc.linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone, dc.legal_name AS legalName, dc.legal_id_card AS legalIdCard, dc.settle_type AS settleType, dc.settle_period AS settlePeriod, dc.bus_license_front_img AS busLicenseFrontImg, dc.bus_license_back_img AS busLicenseBackImg, dc.transport_license_front_img AS transportLicenseFrontImg, dc.transport_license_Back_img AS transportLicenseBackImg, dc.bank_open_front_img AS bankOpenFrontImg, dc.bank_open_Back_img AS bankOpenBackImg, dc.MODE AS MODE, dc.is_invoice AS isInvoice, dc.state AS state, sbcb.card_type AS cardType, sbcb.card_name AS cardName, sbcb.bank_name AS bankName, sbcb.card_no AS cardNo, dc.check_time as operateTime, ba.NAME AS operateName FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type =2 AND user_type = 2) urd ON urd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = urd.user_id LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON sbcb.user_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN b_admin ba ON ba.id = dc.check_user_id
dc.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and dc.linkman like CONCAT('%',#{linkman},'%')
and dc.linkman_phone like CONCAT('%',#{linkmanPhone},'%')
and sbcb.card_no like CONCAT('%',#{cardNo},'%')
and dc.legal_name like CONCAT('%',#{legalName},'%')
and dc.legal_id_card like CONCAT('%',#{legalIdCard},'%')
and dc.is_invoice = #{isInvoice}
and dc.settle_type = #{settleType}
and dc.state = #{state}
and ba.name like CONCAT('%',#{operateName},'%')
and dc.type = 2 and urd.role_id IN (SELECT id FROM s_role WHERE role_range = 2 AND state = 1 AND role_name LIKE '%管理员%') group by dc.id order by dc.create_time desc,dc.check_time desc

SELECT dc.id AS carrierId, dc.NAME AS NAME, dc.linkman AS linkman, dc.linkman_phone AS linkmanPhone, dc.legal_name AS legalName, dc.legal_id_card AS legalIdCard, dc.bus_license_front_img AS busLicenseFrontImg, dc.bus_license_back_img AS busLicenseBackImg, dc.transport_license_front_img AS transportLicenseFrontImg, dc.transport_license_back_img AS transportLicenseBackImg, dc.bank_open_front_img AS bankOpenFrontImg, dc.bank_open_back_img AS bankOpenBackImg, dc.settle_period, dc.settle_type AS settleType, dc.MODE AS MODE, dc.is_invoice AS isInvoice, sbcb.card_type AS cardType, sbcb.card_name AS cardName, sbcb.bank_name AS bankName, sbcb.card_no AS cardNo FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2) urd ON urd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = urd.user_id LEFT JOIN s_bank_card_bind sbcb ON sbcb.user_id = dc.id where dc.id = #{carrierId} group by dc.id

SELECT dc.type AS type, dc.NAME AS NAME, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2) surd ON surd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = surd.user_id
(dd.phone = #{phone} or dd.id_card = #{idCard})
and dd.id <> #{driverId}
limit 1

SELECT dd.id AS id, dc.id AS carrierId, surd.id AS roleId, dd.user_id AS userId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard, dd.identity AS identity, dd.business_state AS businessState, surd.state AS state, ( CASE sr.role_name WHEN '个人司机' THEN 0 WHEN '下属司机' THEN 1 WHEN '承运商管理员' THEN 2 WHEN '承运商超级管理员' THEN 3 END ) AS role, dc.type AS type, dc.state AS carrierState, dc.NAME AS companyName, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dd.photo_img AS photoImg FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = surd.user_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN s_role sr ON sr.id = surd.role_id WHERE dd.id = #{driverId} and dc.state < 4

SELECT count( dd.id ) FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = surd.user_id
(dd.phone = #{phone} OR dd.id_card = #{idCard})
AND dc.type = 1

SELECT dd.id AS id, dc.id AS carrierId, surd.id AS roleId, dd.user_id AS userId, dd.real_name AS realName, dd.phone AS phone, dd.id_card AS idCard, dd.identity AS identity, dd.business_state AS businessState, surd.state AS state, ( CASE sr.role_name WHEN '个人司机' THEN 0 WHEN '下属司机' THEN 1 WHEN '承运商管理员' THEN 2 WHEN '承运商超级管理员' THEN 3 END ) AS role, dc.type AS type, dc.state AS carrierState, dc.NAME AS companyName, dvr.plate_no AS plateNo, dd.photo_img AS photoImg FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = surd.user_id LEFT JOIN d_vehicle_running dvr ON dvr.driver_id = dd.id LEFT JOIN s_role sr ON sr.id = surd.role_id WHERE surd.id = #{roleId} and surd.user_id = #{loginId} and dc.state < 4

SELECT count( dd.id ) FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2 ) surd ON surd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = surd.user_id
(dd.phone = #{phone} OR dd.id_card = #{idCard})
AND dc.type = 1

SELECT count( dd.id ) FROM d_carrier dc LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM s_user_role_dept WHERE dept_type = 2 AND user_type = 2) surd ON surd.dept_id = dc.id LEFT JOIN d_driver dd ON dd.id = surd.user_id
dc.id = #{carrierId} and (dd.phone = #{phone} or dd.id_card = #{idCard}) and dc.type = 2
